verses.verse: Give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for He is good; <S%H2896><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting. <S%H5769><s%>
Give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the God <S%H430><s%> of gods, <S%H430><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting. <S%H5769><s%>
Give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord <S%H113><s%> of lords, <S%H113><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting. <S%H5769><s%>
To Him who alone <S%H905><s%> does <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> wonders, <S%H6381><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting; <S%H5769><s%>
To Him who made <S%H6213><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> with skill, <S%H8394><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting; <S%H5769><s%>
To Him who spread <S%H7554><s%> out the earth <S%H776><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the waters, <S%H4325><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting; <S%H5769><s%>
To Him who made <S%H6213><s%> [the] great <S%H1419><s%> lights, <S%H216><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting: <S%H5769><s%>
The sun <S%H8121><s%> to rule <S%H4475><s%> by day, <S%H3117><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting, <S%H5769><s%>
The moon <S%H3394><s%> and stars <S%H3556><s%> to rule <S%H4475><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting. <S%H5769><s%>
To Him who smote <S%H5221><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> in their first-born, For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting, <S%H5769><s%>
And brought <S%H3318><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> out from their midst, <S%H8432><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting, <S%H5769><s%>
With a strong <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> and an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm, <S%H2220><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting; <S%H5769><s%>
To Him who divided <S%H1504><s%> the Red <S%H5488><s%> <S%H3220><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%> asunder, <S%H1506><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting, <S%H5769><s%>
And made Israel <S%H3478><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> through the midst <S%H8432><s%> of it, For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting; <S%H5769><s%>

But He overthrew <S%H5287><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and his army <S%H2428><s%> in the Red <S%H5488><s%> <S%H3220><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting. <S%H5769><s%>
To Him who led <S%H1980><s%> His people <S%H5971><s%> through the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting; <S%H5769><s%>
To Him who smote <S%H5221><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> kings, <S%H4428><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting, <S%H5769><s%>
And slew <S%H2026><s%> mighty <S%H117><s%> kings, <S%H4428><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting: <S%H5769><s%>
Sihon, <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting, <S%H5769><s%>
And Og, <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting, <S%H5769><s%>
And gave <S%H5414><s%> their land <S%H776><s%> as a heritage, <S%H5159><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting, <S%H5769><s%>
Even a heritage <S%H5159><s%> to Israel <S%H3478><s%> His servant, <S%H5650><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting. <S%H5769><s%>
Who <S%H7945><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> us in our low <S%H8216><s%> estate, <S%H8216><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting, <S%H5769><s%>
And has rescued <S%H6561><s%> us from our adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting; <S%H5769><s%>
Who gives <S%H5414><s%> food <S%H3899><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting. <S%H5769><s%>
Give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the God <S%H410><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting. <S%H5769><s%>
